Ratings.comment: I've had her for Polish 1101, 1102, 1103, and Slavic 2230. In all of these she was never too difficult and lectures were always informative.
While the readings and lectures could be long, Slavic Vampires was a very interesting class taught by a caring professor. The grading could be a little bit slow, but the content was great.

If you can take a class with this professor, do it! She is a kind individual and excellent at teaching. She teaches in a way that you genuinely learn the material. The lectures never drag on because she switches between different engaging activities throughout the class. Just take Polish!! It's a good class!

Slavic vampires is an amazing class that teaches you way more than you would expect and gives you two semesters worth of GR credit. You get to read about vampires with an amazing professor, what isnt to love????

Ewa is the best teacher I've ever had. She's even really nice and helpful with the dumb kids. There is really nothing bad about her, though it took me a little while to realize that when she says "popular," she just means "common." I totally recommend her.
